details.arabic_diacless: ربنا ما خلقت هٰذا باطلا ۚسبحٰنك فقنا عذاب النار
details.arabic: رَبَّنَا مَا خَلَقۡتَ هٰذَا بَاطِلًا ۚسُبۡحٰنَكَ فَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
details.transliteration: Rabbana ma khalaqta hadha batila Subhanaka faqina 'adhaban-Naar
details.translations: Our Lord, You did not create this aimlessly; exalted are You [above such a thing]; then protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

details.arabic_diacless: ربناۤ انك من تدخل النار فقد اخزيتهٗ ‌ؕ وما للظٰلمين من انصار
details.arabic: رَبَّنَاۤ اِنَّكَ مَنۡ تُدۡخِلِ النَّارَ فَقَدۡ اَخۡزَيۡتَهٗ ‌ؕ وَمَا لِلظّٰلِمِيۡنَ مِنۡ اَنۡصَارٍ
details.transliteration: Rabbana innaka man tudkhilin nara faqad akhzaytah wa ma liDh-dhalimeena min ansar
details.translations: Our Lord, indeed whoever You admit to the Fire - You have disgraced him, and for the wrongdoers there are no helpers.

details.arabic_diacless: ربناۤ اننا سمعنا مناديا ينادى للايمان ان اٰمنوا بربكم فاٰمنا ۖربنا فاغفر لنا ذنوبنا وكفر عنا سياٰتنا وتوفنا مع الابرار
details.arabic: رَبَّنَاۤ اِنَّنَا سَمِعۡنَا مُنَادِيًا يُّنَادِىۡ لِلۡاِيۡمَانِ اَنۡ اٰمِنُوۡا بِرَبِّكُمۡ فَاٰمَنَّا ۖرَبَّنَا فَاغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوۡبَنَا وَكَفِّرۡ عَنَّا سَيِّاٰتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ الۡاَبۡرَارِ
details.transliteration: Rabbana innana samiAAnamunadiyan yunadee lil-eemani an aminoobirabbikum faamanna rabbana faghfirlana thunoobana wakaffir AAannasayyi-atina watawaffana maAAa al-abrar
details.translations: Our Lord, indeed we have heard a caller calling to faith, [saying], 'Believe in your Lord,' and we have believed. Our Lord, so forgive us our sins and remove from us our misdeeds and cause us to die with the righteous.

details.arabic_diacless: ‌ربنا واٰتنا ما وعدتنا علٰى رسلك ولا تخزنا يوم القيٰمة ‌ؕ انك لا تخلف الميعاد
details.arabic: ‌رَبَّنَا وَاٰتِنَا مَا وَعَدتَّنَا عَلٰى رُسُلِكَ وَلَا تُخۡزِنَا يَوۡمَ الۡقِيٰمَةِ ‌ؕ اِنَّكَ لَا تُخۡلِفُ الۡمِيۡعَادَ
details.transliteration: Rabbana waatina mawaAAadtana AAala rusulika wala tukhzinayawma alqiyamati innaka la tukhlifu almeeAAad
details.translations: Our Lord, and grant us what You promised us through Your messengers and do not disgrace us on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed, You do not fail in [Your] promise.
